item.title: Report E-2025060111
item.description:
Report E-2025060111

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-15
  • City: NORTH CLARENDON
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ESTES EXPRESS LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 10397
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Environmental Services, Inc. (CT) was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted a 20ft-by-5ft area of the trailer and estimated that fifteen (15) gallons of material was released due to one (1) 15-gallon drum being damaged. Environmental Services, Inc. (CT) personnel observed that all the released material had dried. All freight was unloaded from the trailer by contractor personnel, and they deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area. The leaking drum was overpacked into one (1) 55-gallon poly drum and they secured the trailer. Contractor personnel followed the impacted truck to the nearest ESTES terminal located in Bellows Falls, VT. Environmental Services, Inc. (CT) then used three (3) 55-gallon poly drums to containerize the spent granular absorbents. All work was approved by the terminal supervisor after the contractor completed their clean-up. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal. The generated waste will remain onsite for the ESTES DGRM team to coordinate disposal
